backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining SurgeryCase, Task, TaskOptions, UserProfile, and OpenAIConfig types with CRUD operations for cases and user profiles, plus authorization mixins for admin and user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: default sort order to arrival date (oldest first) on Dashboard and Cases pages, and increased MRN font size on both pages.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend TypeScript/React files including App.tsx, hooks, case management components, validation, search, CSV import/export, and authentication components with their key functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, borders, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA manifest, favicons in multiple sizes, theme color, viewport settings, and Apple mobile web app meta tags for SurgiPaw application.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining SurgiPaw app metadata including name, icons, display mode (standalone), theme colors, and start URL for installable web app functionality.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, precaching app shell on install, cleaning old caches on activate, and skipping Internet Identity and API calls from caching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing authentication with Internet Identity, view switching between dashboard/cases/settings, profile setup modal, navigation buttons, and case selection state with forced light theme.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Login/logout button component using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout, error handling for duplicate authentication, and primary/outline button styling based on auth state.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name on first login, preventing dismissal until profile is created.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines checklist items (discharge notes, labs, imaging, etc.) with configuration for task selection/completion tracking and utility functions for calculating task progress and styling.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Displays a surgery case card with editable notes, task checklist with color-coded badges, and delete functionality with confirmation dialog.
Dialog for creating/editing surgery cases with AI-powered text parsing, speech recognition, MRN-based auto-prefill, and comprehensive form fields including patient details and task checklist.
Main list view component that displays filtered, sorted, and searchable surgery cases with support for highlighting and scrolling to specific cases.
Search input component with clear button for filtering cases by any field.
Dropdown select control for sorting cases using predefined sort options.
Popover filter with checkboxes for filtering cases by species (canine, feline, etc.) with session storage persistence.
A popover filter component for cases that allows filtering by task types and completed tasks, with state persisted to session storage and a badge showing active filter count.
A checklist component that displays task items with checkboxes, supporting both creation mode (selecting tasks) and completion mode (marking tasks complete), with color-coded borders and backgrounds.
A component providing CSV import/export functionality for surgery cases, handling file parsing, validation errors, progress tracking, and backend mutations for creating or updating cases.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input field component with calendar picker that auto-formats MM/DD/YYYY input, validates dates, and supports auto-advancing to the next field on completion.
Core CSV import/export logic that converts surgery cases to/from CSV format, parses and validates CSV rows, handles field mapping, and matches existing cases by medical record number.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the CSV schema with 17 columns for surgery case import/export, including headers, validation constants for species/sex/boolean values, and documentation of expected formats and field mappings.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides filtering functions for surgery cases by species, task types, task completion status, and whether all tasks are completed or not.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: React hook that wraps the browser's Web Speech API for voice-to-text transcription with error handling, browser compatibility checks, and recording state management.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors (O/0, I/1/l), and removing artifacts as a fallback for text cleaning.
Parses structured text with label:value format into CaseFormData fields using regex patterns, handling voice dictation variations and natural language patterns for medical records.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates a printable PDF report of surgery cases with remaining tasks using browser's native print functionality via a hidden iframe without external dependencies.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of surgery cases with remaining tasks, including proper CSV field escaping and timestamped filenames.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utilities for PDF display including date conversion from bigint nanoseconds, species/sex enum to readable text, text truncation, and task list formatting.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting utilities for CSV reports including date conversion from bigint nanoseconds and species/sex enum to readable text strings.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Implements case search functionality that filters surgery cases by matching query strings against basic fields (MRN, pet name, owner, species, etc.) and incomplete checklist tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file, likely a placeholder for future AI image analysis service implementation.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Provides sorting functionality for surgery cases with options for arrival date (newest/oldest) and open task count (most/fewest), using checklist item counts.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types and constants for case forms, including species options (canine/feline/other), sex options, and the CaseFormData interface with all case fields.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Contains validation functions for case form fields (MRN, pet name, owner, breed) and utility functions for date parsing/formatting and conversion between Date objects and nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard component that displays a filterable, searchable, and sortable list of surgery cases with task status indicators, species badges, and navigation to individual cases.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions for extracting open tasks from surgery cases and calculating total open task counts across multiple cases using checklist items.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Settings page component for configuring OpenAI API key with validation status display, secure input field with show/hide toggle, and save functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, handling identity changes and invalidating dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom React hook that debounces a changing value with configurable delay (default 500ms) using setTimeout and cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality, managing AuthClient creation, identity persistence, and login status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for surgery case CRUD operations including getAllCases, getCaseByMedicalRecordNumber, createCase, and updateCase with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light theme colors including blue backgrounds, orange for presenting complaints, and green for notes fields.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point setting up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf-autotable module types.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf module types.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for Tesseract.js OCR library including Worker, RecognizeResult, and various text recognition data structures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and sessionStorage values, supporting both standard and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended border radius variables, and typography/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking veterinary case management app features with pending requests to set default sort by Arrival Date and increase MRN font size.
